questions.question: Which of the following is a primary benefit of using Amazon SageMaker Experiments in a machine learning workflow?
options: Offering real-time collaboration for multiple users in a single experiment.
Capturing and organizing metadata for trials to ensure reproducibility.
Automatically tuning hyperparameters without manual intervention.
Deploying models directly to production environments.
correct_answers: Capturing and organizing metadata for trials to ensure reproducibility.
questions.Practice test: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate MLA-C01
